phrases.original: When you send an invite by text message or e-mail, by default your message will only contain the name of the event and a link for the recipient to click on. But you can add additional text below the link, for a more personal touch.
phrases.translated: When you send an invite by text message or e-mail, by default your message will only contain the name of the event and a link for the recipient to click on. But you can add additional text below the link, for a more personal touch.

phrases.original: Hi, it's {NAME}. It was nice talking with you. I hope you can join us.
phrases.translated: Hi, it's {NAME}. It was nice talking with you. I hope you can join us.

phrases.original: You can be immediately notified if someone you invited views or interacts with their invite. This allows you to follow up with them in a timely manner.
phrases.translated: You can be immediately notified if someone you invited views or interacts with their invite. This allows you to follow up with them in a timely manner.

phrases.original: Note: the above notification settings apply to all invites. An alternative option is to unsubscribe from notifications about a specific invite. The link to do this is within the e-mail notification.
phrases.translated: Note: the above notification settings apply to all invites. An alternative option is to unsubscribe from notifications about a specific invite. The link to do this is within the e-mail notification.

phrases.original: When you send an invite, you can automatically add the recipient to your Follow Up List. This setting only applies to future invites, and not retroactively.
phrases.translated: When you send an invite, you can automatically add the recipient to your Follow Up List. This setting only applies to future invites, and not retroactively.

phrases.original: Automatically add invite recipients to my Follow Up List
phrases.translated: Automatically add invite recipients to my Follow Up List
